## thumbnail_url
![thumbnail_url](https://thumbnail_url.png)

## source_url
https://distribution/source/url

## download_action
```python
get('https://download_url.zip')
```

## import_action
```python
unzip(encoding='cp932'); import_world('path/to.blend','world name')
```
